message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.NI

This paper proposes a new architecture for reducing storage costs in blockchains, which involves the use of fountain codes to encode validated blocks into smaller coded blocks. This topic is closely related to cryptography (cs.CR), distributed computing (cs.DC), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), information theory (cs.IT), and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
